meanings.definition: Extend or stretch out to full length.
meanings.sent1: She outstretches her arms to hug her friend tightly.
meanings.sent2: The cat outstretches its body while napping in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The tree outstretches its branches as if trying to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: The river outstretches its path through the valley, carving a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: His ambition outstretches his current abilities, driving him to work harder.

meanings.sent1: The athlete outstretches his arm to grab the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The bridge outstretches over the river, connecting the two sides of the city.
meanings.sent3: The vine outstretches towards the sunlight, eager to grow and thrive.
meanings.sent4: Her influence outstretches her own community, reaching people far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the mountain outstretches across the valley as the sun sets.
